TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CompareValidator extends System.Web.UI.MobileControls.BaseValidator

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Web.Mobile.dll assembly has been deprecated and should no longer be used. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157231.")

summary.span: Determines validity by comparing a specific field in one control to a specific field in another control, using a specifiable comparison operator.

span.span: Determines validity by comparing a specific field in one control to a specific field in another control, using a specifiable comparison operator.

summary.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用比較驗證程式，請確定兩個文字方塊的值提供相同的值，例如確認新密碼。Use compare validators to ensure that the values of two text boxes provide the same values, such as confirming a new password. 這個類別的行為即會相同 asp.net控制項。This class behaves identically to the ASP.NET control. 根據預設，表單上的控制項引發任何驗證程式表單上控制項的表單提交給伺服器時執行驗證。By default, controls on a form raise any validator controls on the form to perform validation when the form is submitted to the server. 若要停用自動驗證，請設定屬性控制項`false`。To disable automatic validation, set the property on the controls to `false`. 如果輸入的控制項為空白，就會成功驗證。Validation succeeds if the input control is empty. 使用控制項需要使用者輸入的輸入控制項中的資料。Use a control to require the user to enter data into the input control. ## Examples 下列範例程式碼使用控制項 (`CompareValidator1`) 若要檢查是否兩個文字方塊有相同的值與警示使用者是否不相同。The following example code uses a control (`CompareValidator1`) to check whether the two text boxes have the same value and alerts the user if they are different. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[MobileCompareValidatorSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileCompareValidatorSample/CS/default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MobileCompareValidatorSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileCompareValidatorSample/VB/default.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定進行數值比較的控制項 ID。Specifies the ID of the control to which a value comparison will be made. 您可以使用替代屬性。You can use the property as an alternative. 如果同時指定的值屬性會優先。If both are specified, the value of the property takes precedence.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::UI::WebControls::ValidationCompareOperator Operator { System::Web::UI::WebControls::ValidationCompareOperator get(); void set(System::Web::UI::WebControls::ValidationCompareOperator value); };

summary.span: Gets or sets the comparison operation used in validation.

span.span: Gets or sets the comparison operation used in validation.

summary.span: The default value is .

span.span: The default value is .

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
The comparison operation used in validation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性必須是比較運算子，左側和右側的正確進行評估的屬性。The property must be on the left side of the comparison operator, and the property on the right side, for valid evaluation to occur. 下表顯示可用的作業。The following table shows the available operations. `DataTypeCheck` 檢查兩個控制項的資料類型是否有效。Checks whether the data types for the two controls are valid. `Equal` 檢查是否等於其他兩個控制項。Checks whether the two controls are equal to each other. `GreaterThan` 檢查是否大於另一個控制項。Checks whether one control is greater than the other control. `GreaterThanEqual` 檢查是否大於或等於另一個控制項。Checks whether one control is greater than or equal to the other control. `LessThan` 檢查某個控制項是否小於另一個控制項。Checks whether one control is less than the other control. `LessThanEqual` 檢查某個控制項是否小於或等於另一個控制項。Checks whether one control is less than or equal to the other control. `NotEqual` 檢查控制項是否不相等。Checks whether the controls are not equal to each other.

span.span: The data type of the two values being compared.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表包含的定義列舉型別。The following table contains the definitions of the enumerations. 進行比較之前，這些值隱含轉換成指定的資料類型。The values are implicitly converted to the specified data type before the comparison is made. 如果資料轉換失敗，資料驗證失敗。If the data conversion fails, data validation fails. |列舉Enumeration|值Value|資料類型Data type| |-----------------|-----------|---------------| |`String`|00|`String`| |`Integer`|11|`Integer`| |`Double`|22|`Double`| |`Date`|33|`DateTime`| |`Currency`|44|`Currency`|

exception.span: the specified value is not one of the values.

span.span: the specified value is not one of the values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果兩個和屬性不存在，值屬性使用。If both the and properties are present, the value of the property is used.
